source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 79 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,755 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 204 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 398 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 103,381 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 155,079.
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: Best-in-Slots

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 4,304 to 5,260 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec.
Use: Cheat to immediately gain 5,260 of your highest secondary stat for 15 sec. While out of combat, reconfigure for melee combat instead. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: The wise goblin makes their own luck.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Ashkandur, Fall of the Brotherhood
